aboutMe.p1: I'm Camilo! I started programming with an Amstrad when I was 10. Currently, I am leading development teams in multinational corporations.
aboutMe.p2: Some of my successes include collaborating with Mozilla on the development of the first apps for their FirefoxOS system. Although it's gone today, it was a great advancement in the world of web development.
aboutMe.p3: As a content creator, I have the most-watched Spanish-speaking channel in the world in the Software & Game Development category on Twitch. My goal is to improve the employability of the Hispanic community and their access to quality content.
